text:
Sakuya, sorry,
do you have a moment──?

It's fine, it's nothing urgent.
I'm just preparing for next month's live performance.
I'm drafting ideas for the MC part.

Ah── ...It's the best opportunity
to convey your feelings directly.

I hope a good message reaches all the fans──
your sincere thoughts, Sakuya!

──Hehe, for you to understand without me saying much,
you really are an excellent Producer.

Of course, I'll speak as if addressing each person
individually. ...by the way, what was your request?
